data.name: Kaisa: Resurrection
data.detailed_description:
In Kaisa: Resurrection you play as an undead confused octopus with fuzzy ambitions for vengeance and power. During the day you hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies to satisfy your masters need for fresh blood and corpses.

During the night... Well that's another story.

Gameplay:

  • Hack & Slash yourself through the day to satisfy your masters needs.

  • Scheme & Prepare during the nights.

  • Find or order mighty weapons like REGULAR chopsticks or UNIMPRESSIVE kitchen knifes to improve your combat abilities.

  • Find better ways to attract enemies.

  • Risk and Rewards.

  • Go bananas with brutal attacks on your enemies.

  • Laser Noodles.

  • Not everything is as it seems.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
